showScoreExcerpt: “Though it’s surrounded by heavy clouds, Harmon’s play is plenty sharp and by no means gloomy...How much you respond to ‘Prayer’ may ultimately rest on your taste for such harangues. I admit to finding them hard to follow — not intellectually but emotionally. They leave me cold and a little suspicious.”
